text: (anriyum,) avarkal perumai atittavarkalaka pumiyil timaikalaic ceyyavum culcci ceytarkal. Anal timaikal ceyvatarkana culcci a(c culcci) ceyta)varkalait tavira verevaraiyum culntu kollatu ivarkalukku mun cenror (iraivanukku maru ceytu tantanai perra) valiyait tan ivarkalum etir parkkinranara? Appatiyayin allahvin avvaliyil (atavatu, pavam ceytor tantanai perutalil) yatoru marrattaiyum nir kanamattir allahvin (av) valiyil tirupputalaiyum nir kanamattir
